name: Dodge Roll Dice
description:
Dodge Roll Dice is a 2D action shooting game with dice roll.
You are the dice, and you can attack by rolling while dodging enemy bullet.
Dodging and attack are one and the same. Can you beat enemy dice?

Depending on the roll of the dice, different attacks are made.

 : A rapid bullet
 : 2 little rapid bullet
 : 3-way slow bullet
 : Bullet shields that go around you
 : 5 homing bullet
 : Summon a minion

Control

  • Left-click : Dodge Roll
  • Ctrl + F : Toggle fullscreen
  • Ctrl + F4 : Exit
  • R : Self destruct

This game is made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
